```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(dslabs)
data(movielens)
head(movielens)
```

```{r}
movielens %>% mutate(dates=as_datetime(timestamp)) %>% mutate(years=year(dates),text=format(dates, "%H:%M:%S")) %>% group_by(years) %>% summarize(count=n())
movielens %>% mutate(dates=as_datetime(timestamp)) %>% mutate(years=year(dates),text=format(dates, "%H")) %>% group_by(text) %>% summarize(count=n())

```
